summary: Comprehensive testing of Vedic Astrology application completed successfully. All 14 modules tested including Birth Chart calculation, Kundli Matching, Daily Horoscope, AI Chat, PDF generation, and multi-language support. Backend APIs (100% success rate) and frontend UI integration working perfectly.
passed_tests: Birth Chart calculation with pyswisseph integration
Kundli Matching Gun Milan calculation (36-point system)
Daily Horoscope generation for all rashis
Birth Chart form submission and results display
North Indian diamond chart SVG visualization
Kundli Matching form with two-person input
Kundli Matching results with Ashta-Koota analysis
Daily Horoscope rashi selection and display
AI Chat interface with message input/output
